WORK IN PROGRESS

## Get It!

The image is available on `cgr.dev`:

```
docker pull cgr.dev/chainguard/template:latest
```

## Supported tags

| Tag | Digest | Arch |
| --- | ------ | ---- |
| `latest` | `sha256:29ace7ee94f10be179f578d05902e27389e826acd7c4d87f0605b00cfae8a807`<br/>[View entry in Rekor](https://rekor.tlog.dev/?hash=sha256:29ace7ee94f10be179f578d05902e27389e826acd7c4d87f0605b00cfae8a807) | `386` `amd64` `arm64` `armv6` `armv7` `ppc64le` `riscv64` `s390x` |


## Usage

WORK IN PROGRESS


## Signing

All Chainguard Images are signed using [Sigstore](https://sigstore.dev)!

<details>
<br/>
To verify the image, download <a href="https://github.com/sigstore/cosign">cosign</a> and run:

```
COSIGN_EXPERIMENTAL=1 cosign verify cgr.dev/chainguard/template:latest | jq
```

## Build

This image is built with [apko](https://github.com/chainguard-dev/apko).
